name: Mobile Device Detect Reloaded
author: Guilherme Desimon

sections.installation:
Simple install:

  1. Upload loadMobileDeviceDetectReloaded.php and mobile_device_detect.php to the /wp-content/plugins/mobile_device_detect_reloaded/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure in Mobile Device Detect Reloaded tab in Admin Menu.
sections.description:
This wordpress plugin allows to redirect visitors (desktop, mobile) to a custom target URL, which can be specified in admin.

NOW SUPPORTS WINDOWS PHONE

Based on Matthias Reuter Plugin. This WordPress plugin integrates the Detect Mobile Browsers (Open source mobile phone detection) script from http://detectmobilebrowsers.com/ to wordpress.

It allows to redirect mobile visitors to a custom target URL. Mobile Device Detect for WordPress is licensed to GNU General Public License v3. Now includes the Detect Mobile Browser was created by Chad Smith.

More Informations, Installation Guide and Download are available on the plugin homepage of Mobile Device Detect Reloaded for WordPress.

Follow me on Twitter to keep up with the latest updates Guilherme Desimon
